name: 10 second laps
description:
Tiny arcade game. Do 10 second laps inside a stopwatch and jump to avoid all obstacles!.

**Controls:** `Spacebar` / `Tap` to (double) Jump.

Works on Smartphone, but works better on Desktop.

The game was made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 51, with the theme "Every 10 Seconds" entirely by albertnez@ using:

  • GodotEngine
  • sfxr.me for sounds
  • Fonts Tajawal and Robot Mono
